title: nODirayya hanumantana
sahitya:
nODirayya hanumantana mahimeya bEDiro varagaLanu


anupallavi

  rUDhiyoLu ivanannu pADi pogaLUdippa janara nODi nODi varavanIva gADigAra hanumanna


caraNam 1    andu dasharatha sutanAgi bandu nindu sAkEtadi sandadindippanendu andadim vishvAmitra 
tandu raghurAmanigOreyalandu yAgava kAida sundar rAmanige vandana geivanIta
    caraNam 2    dhIranAgi dhanuva muridu maredu maredu daNDakava sEri ghOra rakkasara sadedu  jaridu tandu 
kapi patiyoDene sEri sakhyavanne mADi dhAriNiyoLu kaDu nAriyenna huDugisida dhIra rAma dUtanIta
    caraNam 3    khyAdiyinda sEtuveyanu kaTTi meTTi rAvaNa paDeya bhUtaLadoLu keDahi biTTu mahAntadoLu 
Itanendu sEri bandu vAta tanujanemma bahu prItiyinda purandara viTTalanna dAsanAda
